description.value: These cybernetic spheres replace your eyes entirely. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#low-light-vision]{low-light vision}, as well as the ability to see infrared and ultraviolet light. These enhancements grant you a +2 bonus to vision-based @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} checks and allow you to notice some things people who can see only the red-violet light spectrum can’t, including the lasers from @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.CW8QWIhaO5cwWIvs]{darkvision capacitors} (see page 209). This doesn’t grant you darkvision, but in darkness you can see significant sources of heat due to your infrared vision.

modifiers.name: Wide-Spectrum Ocular Implant
modifiers.notes: Your Wide-Spectrum Ocular Implant grants you a +2 bonus to vision-based Perception checks and allow you to notice some things people who can see only the red-violet light spectrum can’t, including the lasers from darkvision capacitors (see page 209).
